label: Caves Of Dragonmount 9
description:
Chester, being the a gentleman dragon he is, doesn't want to invade Ember's home and opts to call out to her.  After not hearing anything, he raps loudly on the cave entrance.  Chester then decides she's probably not around, proceeds to check out Glint's cave.

Hit 1 to examine Glint's cave.

Hit 0 to quit.
